about_the_game:
Get ready for an exciting adventure where you will have to find 10 differences between two similar images with cute dogs. This is not only fun, but also a great training for your attention and observation. Enjoy the colorful pictures and interesting details!

"In the whole history of the world there is but one thing that money can not buy... to wit - the wag of a dog's tail." – Josh Billings

Features:

  • 12 unique levels with cute dogs

  • Cartoon style

  • Suitable for all ages

  • Relaxing atmosphere

  • Casual gameplay

name: Dogs Contrast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
